title: Dunk Master Syndra
body: So since you can kinda dunk with syndra's w i thought why not make a Dunk Master skin for her? Plus it would be really cool. and sorry I'm not the best drawer.

replies.body: Tired of all these sports based skins on Syndra, she needs something more interesting and exotic... Hell make her into a female Raiden (MK not MGS) for all I care. Maybe a pajama (A RESPECTABLE FULL PAJAMA YOU PERVERTS!), and she throws stuffed animals at you.

> (A RESPECTABLE FULL PAJAMA YOU PERVERTS!)

Riot: ....That couldn't make money....could it?
=,= It could if you consider making a Pajama Party team...

Top: {{champion:126}} (His shock blast should explode in pillow feathers)
Jungle:{{champion:102}} (Someone had the idea that she would have pillows tied to her arms in this skin.)
Mid:{{champion:134}} (Those toys would be so cute!)
ADC:{{champion:15}} (Who else would throw pillows?)
Support: {{champion:201}}  (Big Pillow for shield)
:3

There are some better concepts:
http://danbooru.donmai.us/posts/1730626

Or Dodgeball if you so prefer:
http://th09.deviantart.net/fs70/PRE/i/2014/056/4/0/dodgeball_syndra__league_of_legends__by_gevurah_studios-d77xz0s.jpg
I'd like to see dodge ball Syndra, personally. And her team name to say something like "unlimited power" instead of Ionia.
i love the idea, but i think it needs a different name, because she doesn't dunk at all, it's more of a regular shot than anything else
She's not really allied with Ionia, even though she's born there, so the shirt needs fixing :P But I like the idea!
Aight bud ive had just about enough out of you!!!
